sentences.en: Some people were unfriendly to the new recruit.
sentences.cn: 一些人对新成员不友好。

sentences.en: She has a very formal manner, which can seem unfriendly.
sentences.cn: 她的举止很是郑重其事，有可能会显得不友好。

sentences.en: People always complain that the big banks and big companies are unfriendly and unhelpful.
sentences.cn: 人们总抱怨大银行和大公司不友好，也不愿帮助人。
